from textwrap import wrap
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    log = input()
    log_chk = ['AB' in i or 'BA' in i for i in wrap(log, 2)]
    print('yes') if all(log_chk) else print('no')

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    entry = input()
    flag = 0
    p = 0
    q = 1
    length = len(entry) // 2
    for j in range(length):
        if entry[p] == entry[q]:
            flag = 1
            break
        p += 2
        q += 2
    if flag == 1:
        print('no')
    else:
        print('yes')
